name: interconnected
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with different parts or things connected or related to each other: The new home consists of seven interconnected buildings. Blogs are heavily interconnected; bloggers read other blogs, link to them, and reference them in their own writing. Our society is too complex and interconnected to defend against all possible threats.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lymphatic system is the interconnected system of lymph nodes and vessels which carries fluid around the body.In today's more interconnected world, Latin America will be among the markets hardest hit by US problems.In our interconnected world our prosperity and security may also be threatened.
